chapters.title: Chapter 14:  White Plumes
chapters.info: Abell Cauthon, p. 271 (340)—Mat's father. He and his wife Natti live in Emond's Field with their two unmarried daughters Eldrin and Bodewhin. They have two other daughters. Abell is excellent with a bow and arrow, and is in general a really nice guy; Mat does not know of anyone that dislikes him. His remaining children are about the age where they start to leave home—twenty, seventeen, and sixteen for Mat, Bode, and Eldrin respectively. He is one of the best judges of horses around, and passed some of his knowledge on to his son. See also Cauthon, Matrim.
